Class Sieve

java.lang.Object
  Sieve

public class Sieve
extends java.lang.Object

The Sieve class creates two lists: one is a list of consecutive integers from 2 through a number determined by the user. Then the program will find all primes up to that value and store them in another list.

Version:
3/12/13
Author:
Grace Thompson

Method Detail

findPrimes

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findPrimes(int num)
This method finds all positive prime numbers up to the value input by the user.

Parameters:
value - input by user that determines the range of values to be examined.
Returns:
ArrayList of prime numbers
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value is less than 2.
